name: Slow Cooker Creamy Tomato Soup
author: faithloren
summary: This rich, creamy, tomato soup is easily made in a slow cooker and features Italian plum tomatoes and half-and-half. It makes for a great go-to on a cold winter day.
ingredients: 2 cloves garlic cloves, smashed and peeled, or more to taste
2 (28 ounce) cans Italian-style plum tomatoes, drained
directions: Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat
Cook, stirring often until fragrant, about 30 seconds
Place in the bottom of a slow cooker
Add plum tomatoes, vegetable broth, tomato sauce, parsley sprigs, salt, and sugar to the slow cooker
Cover and cook on High until tomatoes are stewed, 3 to 4 hours
Puree the soup using an immersion blender
Cover and cook until heated through, 20 to 30 minutes
